# <a name="print-an-attachment-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="989b1-102">在 Outlook.com 中打印附件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989b1-102">Print an attachment in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="989b1-103">打开包含要打印的附件的邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989b1-103">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="989b1-104">将光标移到附件上, 然后选择 "**更多操作**" 图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989b1-104">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **More actions** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="989b1-105">> **下载**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989b1-105">> **Download**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="989b1-106">下载文件后, 使用相应的程序将其打开, 然后选择要打印的选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989b1-106">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989b1-107">例如, 在 Word 中打开一个 .doc 文件, 然后打印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989b1-107">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989b1-108">有关详细信息, 请参阅[Outlook.com 中的 "打印电子邮件"、"附件" 和 "日历](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989b1-108">For more information, read [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
